products.product_name: Rascal + Friends Premium Diapers Size 3, 88 Count,1 Pack, Green,White

reviews.name: Jay S. W.
reviews.title: Better than the named brand
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2025
reviews.review: Despite being a generic brand, these diapers are fantastic. They are thick and cover the child whole lower half without leaving marks on the bottom. We particularly like these as over night diapers as they will last the full night, and not leak. Highly recommend these over other brands.
